analyzed: gsang sngags dang rig sngags dang gzungs sngags dang snying po dang phyag rgya dang ting nge dzin gyi bden ba dang chos nyid gdod nas stongs kyang chos can rgyu bras bslu ba med ba bden ba dang khyad ba du dpal chen po

original: che mchog sgrub sde dgu'i
analyzed: che mchog sgrub sde dgu

original: dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshhogs rnams kyi bka' bden pa dang / sprul pa yang sprul phyag brnyan dang bcas pa'i bka' bden pa dang / bden pa chen po'i mthu la brten nas bstan dang 'gro ba'i spyi dgra /
analyzed: dkyil khor gyi lha tshhogs rnams kyi bka bden ba dang sprul ba yang sprul phyag rnyan dang cha ba bka bden ba dang bden ba chen po mthu la rten nas ston dang gro ba spyi dgra

analyzed: phyi dgra yid la sems ba
